sentences.chinese: 同時，龍也是一種祥瑞之物。

sentences.english: Lions brings good luck according to the legends of the chinese.
sentences.chinese: 獅子是祥瑞靈物，象徵吉祥，帶來好運。

sentences.english: Superstitious people believe that the sight of magpie is a good omen.
sentences.chinese: 迷信的說法認爲看見喜鵲是祥瑞的徵兆。

sentences.english: Red glow is bold and unrestrained, festival auspicious sign , this is revolutionary spirit.
sentences.chinese: 紅色熱情奔放，喜慶祥瑞，這是紅色的精神。

sentences.english: This sculpted jade screen features several dragons, a symbol of good fortune in China.
sentences.chinese: 這件雕工精細的玉屏風裏，有數條代表祥瑞的龍。

sentences.english: If the universe is filled with auspicious proper energy, then the earth will not blow up.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙若充滿祥瑞之正氣，地球就不會爆炸了。

sentences.english: Later the image of phoenix developed into a colorful bird with a long tail and it is the symbol of auspiciousness .
sentences.chinese: 漸漸地鳳以長尾五彩鳥的形象出現了，象徵著祥瑞。

sentences.english: Tortoise is an auspicious animal that the magnifico used it for chop in ancient time.
sentences.chinese: 龜，是祥瑞之物，在古代，有大官的印紐爲龜。

sentences.english: Among them, "A Sealed Book Affair" pushed this adoration to the crest.
sentences.chinese: 其中，“天書事件”將對祥瑞的崇奉推向了頂峯。

definition: Xiangyun county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
long-lived people, rich harvests (idiom); stable and affluent society/prosperity
the dragon and phoenix are symbols of good fortune (idiom)/auspicious/decorated with auspicious symbols such as the dragon and the phoenix
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
variant of 紅運|红运[hong2 yun4]
abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
Longfeng district of Daqing city 大慶|大庆[Da4 qing4], Heilongjiang
to ward off evil spirits/mythical lion-like animal that wards off evil (also called 貔貅[pi2 xiu1])
